column3: Honey: Released May 16, 2019, by the National Agricultural Statistics Service (NASS), Agricultural Statistics Board, United States Department of Agriculture (USDA).
Pollination and Other Income – United States: 2016, 2017 and 2018

[Operations that qualify as a farm. Represents incomes from the total number of colonies, regardless of whether honey was harvested. For more estimates on the total number of colonies, see the Honey Bee Colonies" report]"
